titleStmt.title: W. Haslip et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG4463

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: To the Hon Govnor of Kentucky

We the undersigned citizens of Edmonson county would respectfully call your attention to a fine against, Garret Vincent for the sum of thirty dollars for the offese of Gaming at a game called Chuckyluck Mr Vincent is a poor man and need the benefit of his labors and is a man that does not follow gaming but he through amusement did bet one five cents on a game and we would desire your honor to remit Said fine

Yours Truly
W Haslip
James crawford
T. J. Sweeney
W. H. Willis
W. H. Clark
James Lock
M. Hayslip
Brandon Keeton
James Madison
Levi Edwards
A L Edwards
P. S. Hayslip
James Reed
John W Bailey
Amos Jenny
G. W. Cook
M. C. Hayslip
J. H. Harvey
Carl Kinser
M. M Logan
L D Kash
H K Walker
Aron Larson

Edmondson
vs
Garret Vincent
Pet for remission
Refused Decr 3 1863
Tho E Bramlette
Ansd
5th Dec/ 63
